channel.title: What do you tihnk of wildy runners
channel.description: well today i lost 3 awsome fights in the wildy i didnt die lose but i lost my reward. its because the noobs runs i could have gotten rune 2h and 2 rune scimys nad lots arrows. then one of them have the nerve to come back and attack my once they gotten more food and and it went on 2 more times with that noob until my cb lvl raised and i couldnt attack him. whatt do you tihnnk of those noobs that run

item.title: What do you tihnk of wildy runners
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

not2good:

I run, not because I’m not a respectable player but because I’m a SMART player.

Pwnt rite there. Same here

Read full topic

item.title: What do you tihnk of wildy runners
item.dc:creator: @footballplayar34 footballplayar34
item.description:
@footballplayar34 wrote:

Scar:

they are very footballplayer-like…they also run…

lol nice one scar

The Un-Named:

Oh, so if you was || away from loosing all your weapons/armor/food would YOU run?

i never run or telly when i fight i prefer to die than run its much more respectable. also when i fight i go past level 20 wildy so we cant tely or run away in time

Read full topic
